content: try this easy to follow ribbed cup cozy crochet pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this mug cozy crochet pattern will help you make your own crochet cup cozy with confidence so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details - available only in english using us crochet terms - skill level begginer crochet skills and knowledge finished size if using a 3mm hook = c/2 and light worsted #3 = dk yarn - width 8cm 3 inches - length will depend on the size of your cup - you can easily customise the length of your cozy by increasing or decreasing the number of row - terminology us crochet terminology - gauge 2 x 2 14 stitches x 15 worked row this crochet cup cozy pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern materials needed yarn - this pattern will work nicely with 100% cotton 100% acrylic or a blend of both the cozy is likely to be more stretchy if using acrylic so you may need to adjust the size to allow for the stretch - i recommend using this yarn weight light worsted #3 = dk i used 3 different colours to make 3 cup cozies - light worsted #3 = dk - 100% cotton - 1x ball of claret yarn - james c brett/it s pure cotton - colour claret ic23 - 100g/215m - 1x ball of sage yarn - james c brett/it s pure cotton - colour sage ic16 - 100g/215m - 1x ball of mustard yarn - james c brett/it s pure cotton - colour mustard ic21 - 100g/215m equipment - crochet hook i used 3mm = c/2 but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - scissors yarn needle measuring tape - handmade labels - optional you may sell the crochet items you made using this modern cup cozy crochet pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
